title: Massive Freeze before minion Spawn? what?
body:
Hello league of legends community!

I'm writing this post to ask for your help, since something REALLY strange is happening to me.
I'm lagging BEFORE the minions spawn, like MASSIVE freezes when i try to walk.
This is aweful when you try to invade with your team or try to proxy as singed, and i would like
to know more about this bug and how to solve it?

Thanks for the help, Gunduct~


{{champion:32}} {{champion:32}} {{champion:32}}

replies.body: It sounds like you might be having a poor or bad connection that can't keep up with the constant communication needed while in-game.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to get an overview of your network, as well as troubleshooting steps.  Let me know what you find in the reader.
Thanks for the help but i found out the bug on my own, i simply had TOO MUCH frames per second, thanks anyway!
